input.sentences: for my boyfriend 's 25th birthday | i got a lot of friends together .
i made him a very funky cake | with blue frosting and lots of dots .
he loved the cake . he 's a cake guy . a birthday is n't a birthday without cake for him .
i used my finger to decorate him with frosting .
i love it that he knows how to have fun !
output.sentences: A group of friends all got together for a birthday party.
They all helped light the candles on a cake with a lot of frosting.
Everyone sang to the birthday boy, and some took pictures of him as well.
When it was time to cut the cake and give a piece to everyone things got funny.
Someone put blue frosting all over the birthday boys face.
